I was super excited about this until I saw that it was toe controlled. The toes are so undextrous. If you require one of your other limbs to control it, it's not really an extra limb, it's just a redistribution of your available limbs. We've already have the ability to redistribute two limbs into two thumbs since the invention of pliers. You could never pilot a third arm with this technique.
